name: Text_9
description:
Text_9 is a simple platformer game in which you play as a small green dragon. This dragon must undergo a series of trials in order to prove allegiance to the Queen of Dragons. She is always watching... no matter what challenges the trials may bring.

It's a pretty easy game, but I hope anyone who tries it enjoys it anyway! All graphics/animation/backgrounds are hand-drawn. Use ctrl+f to fullscreen the game.
